violations.description: Ensure an element's role supports its ARIA attributes
violations.help: Elements must only use supported ARIA attributes

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-selected="false"

violations.description: Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
violations.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

violations.description: Ensure every ARIA input field has an accessible name
violations.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute

violations.description: Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
violations.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has children which are not allowed: [role=presentation]

violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.35 (foreground color: #ffdc2c, background color: #ffffff, font size: 9.8pt (13px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

violations.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
violations.help: Frames must have an accessible name

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has no title attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
violations.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Heading order invalid

violations.description: Ensure the complementary landmark or aside is at top level
violations.help: Aside should not be contained in another landmark

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The null landmark is contained in another landmark.

violations.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

violations.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color
violations.help: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.41:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #444444, surrounding text: #2d2d2d)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

Fix any of the following:
  The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.41:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #444444, surrounding text: #2d2d2d)
  The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

violations.description: Ensure interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
violations.help: Interactive controls must not be nested
